original_title: 16-hour water cut in several areas of Colombo on Saturday (24)
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The National Water Supply and Drainage Board says that there will be a 16-hour water cut in several areas of Colombo on Saturday (24).
Accordingly, Water supply will be suspended in Colombo 11, 12, 13, 14, and 15, for 16 hours from 8 am to 12 midnight today.
This is due to an essential upgrade being carried out by the Ambatale Water Supply System Improvements & Energy Savings Project.
